meanings.definition: A person who makes a raid or brief invasion.
meanings.sent1: The brave forayer led the group on a quick raid.
meanings.sent2: The forayer stealthily entered the enemy camp.
meanings.sent3: The forayer accidentally raided the wrong house and returned the stolen cookies.
meanings.sent4: She was a forayer into the world of adventure, always seeking new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The forayer's daring raid will be remembered for years to come.

meanings.definition: To make a raid or brief invasion.
meanings.sent1: The band of warriors decided to forayer the enemy's stronghold under the cover of darkness.
meanings.sent2: They forayered the village, taking what they needed and leaving swiftly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon forayered the picnic basket, stealing all the sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: The idea for the new product forayered into the market, disrupting the competition.
meanings.sent5: The storm forayered through the town, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake.
